column2: "Oh, hello! Thanks to you, I was able to produce some amazing chocolate!"
"Chocolate nowadays needs stamina, not just tastiness or love! At least, I think so!"
"So that's why I don't want to have a tasting for the next chocolate, but I want to have a test."
"Yes, a decisive stamina test! I want to see how long it'll last in the harsh environs of somewhere like Volcanic Caverns!"
"I'm full aware that this is an absurd test! But please, do it as I ask!"
